page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: CARNOUSTIE,A SEASIDE TOWN IS SITUATED ON THE SHORE OF A BEAUTIFUL BAY ON THE EAST COAST OF SCOTLAND,6 MILES EAST OF DUNDEE.BARRY,A SMALL VILLAGE TO THE WEST OF THE TOWN,IS NOW INCORPORATED IN THE BURGH OF CARNOUSTIE.THE AREA, LACKING IN AMENITIES,IS MAINLY RESIDENTIAL,MOST OF THE DWELLINGS BEING LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSES.BARRY IS A LINEAR DEVELOPMENT OF OLD STONE COTTAGES RECENTLY MODERNISED,ALONG THE LINE OF THE MAIN THOROUGHFARE. THE LANDWARD AREA IS AGRICULTURAL AND THE SEAWARD AREA IS AN ARMY TRAINING CAMP AND ALSO A GOLF COURSE.
